ComicInfo.Title: Skanks, Shanks and Shackles Part Three
ComicInfo.Summary:
Vindictive wardens, disgraced sandwich kings, and past enemies thought to be dead. Boy, Janey sure has her hands full in this action packed conclusion of Skanks, Shanks, and Shackles.
Features a risqué variant, plus limited edition (Marcelo Trom) and artist (Bill McKay) variants and risqué variants.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Dan Mendoza | 1 | B | Risqué Cover, Limited to 2500 | Dan Mendoza | 4 | C | Limited Edition Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Marcelo Trom | 5 | D | Limited Edition Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Marcelo Trom | 6 | E | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Bill McKay | 7 | F | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Bill McKay | 8 | G | New York Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | Chad Cicconi | 9 | H | New York Comic Con Exclusive Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Chad Cicconi | 2, 10 | I | Stan Lee's Comikaze Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 500 | Bill McKay | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-26 20:56:48. [CVDB553785]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Bill McKay, Chad Cicconi, Dan Mendoza, Marcelo Trom
